original: 隴西枹罕縣人。漢末天下大亂，宋建趁機佔據枹罕，自號「河首平漢王」，改年號，置百官，自成一國三十餘年，才被曹操討伐。
text: A native of Shanhan County, Longxi. At the end of the Han Dynasty, the world was in chaos. Song Jian took the opportunity to occupy Yanhan. He named himself 'He Shou Ping Han Wang', changed his reign, and appointed a hundred officials. He became a country for more than 30 years before being attacked by Cao Cao.
